name: Chupa Shooter
description:
A simple space shooter game created to make fun of my friends using their weaknesses as the projectiles to destroy them. Featuring a character selector with 8 differect characters to choose from, and a multitude of 8 bit music. This is also the first game that I have ever made so I used the GDevelop game making software for an easier and more smooth experience, but I will soon move to using the Unity engine for the rest of my games in the future. THIS GAME IS VERY LOUD, so I suggest that you put your volume on a 6-12 if you are on a computer.

CONTROLS:

WASD

CLICK AND DRAG (left click mouse)
